content: Excellent work, as everything by Wave Light. Besides, this talented dev delivers impressive technical support and help.
replyContent: Sure ... please send me an email with some details amd I'll work on it.  Looking to improve UI in the next update.

content: On the whole I quite liked Shieldwall Chroniclesa as a strategy RPG. The focus here is definitely on the combat with story taking a backseat to the fighting. The characters offer a good mix of skills and specializations although I definitely felt certain builds worked better than others (tanks are kings in this system). There are some minor bugs and glitches and the level up system is quirky but I'd definitely be back for another go from Wavelight.
Great game as always. Looking forward to seeing whats next from this dev. Thank you.
Possible to get to work with samsung note stylus? The stylus works everywhere expect combat area.
replyContent: Sorry ... its something we've not figured out yet in the backend code.  Cant promise it but if we figure it out, we'll add it.

content: please dev dont stop making games. Your games all have good quality (for mobile game standard at least). But i feel sad everytime i see good devs and his good game dont get enough attention/support. Maybe periodically you can put your games on sale to make the playstore algorithm put your game on highlight again.
replyContent: Thanks for the kind words.  Will definitely continue to make games.  Should have a scifi game launch soon and then will work on the next shieldwall chronicles game next year.

content: text is readable now, thx. But some parts, like the graphic quality menu, are still tiny and very difficult to change/read. Please fix // Great game!
replyContent: Thanks for letting me know.  Will fix that in the next update.

content: No dwarf bombardier??
replyContent: Not yet but will be added in the future.  It is held up by some technical issues related to app size.

content: Awesome turnbased rpg game. Tons of loots

Not good on Galaxy S9. Everything is to small, Buttons & Text etc. I gave up at the character select screen because they all looked the same due to how small they were. I couldn't play it like that. I've enjoyed both Demons Rise games but this was unplayable. these issues will be fixed I'm sure but I refunded. Edit. No update since launch ( March 2019) Still unplayable due to everything being tiny. Not good.
replyContent: Hi, the latest update has addressed this issue.

content: 1. Fonts are too small for 6-6.5 inch phones. 2. Health and action point bars hide most of the action when you zoom out. 3. Hasn't been updated since launch on 2019. And most of all: 4. As rounds go by, it takes more and more time to begin the next round, when you press the next round button. To the point where the game gets stuck and I have to shut it down and launch it again.
It becomes repetitive

I own all the games made by this dev and this one plays the best! It's a polished version of demon's rise (though i love that game as well). I like the medieval feel of the game, with less fantastical beasts and more knights, assassin's, rangers. Graphics are great, gameplay is excellent.

I have bgt 1 of their previous game so I bgt this as well and it did not disappoint me at all. If u like rpg strategy game with random item loots and difficulty selection. No iap and offline then this is for u. U can play anytime u want. Item drops maybe little but there are tons of random items u can equip on 6 party members. No Items will be the same all the time. Only thing using smartphone to play will be the small fonts. Great job for the developer to bring this over. 5 Stars.
Great party based rpg. Simple and fun

This game is very well made. Quality graphics and animations? Check. Depth to Strategy and tactics? Check. No MFing iaps? Check. Yes, the text is kinda small but I can read it just fine. I downloaded it to my phone cuz my tablet is potato and phone isnt but it would be even better on a good tab. Well worth the $, imo.

The game is pretty good I would give it a 4 or 5, but my only issue and a major one at that is with the text. I have great eye sight but the text is so small I struggle to read it... That's a must fix. When that issue is fixed I'll change my rating...

good strategy and average rpg game. A little slow paced and grinding but fun could use charater movement point increase for leving up or items and a multiple save in game save feature and more rpg control but overall a good game.
good so far but only lvl 2 lol. hard to read the smaller text on note 8
One of Android's best tactical games. Superb.
This was definitely worth the money spent
another excellent work by wavelight
Best turn based RPG that I've ever played. Kudos to the developers!
Doesn't even load.
Great game from a great developer. Instant buy for me
Not worth the cost right now, as it plays very buggy. I think it has good potential, needs some polishing. also the UI is badly scaled and I play on a large phone ( Note 8).
replyContent: Can you send me an email with details of the bugs?  I have not received many bug reports to date from other customers.

content: More good stuff! If strategy battles are your jam, this is your game right here!
Fantastic! I've enjoyed everything from Wave Light Games to date, and this is the best elements of all of them in one great game.
Just like the other games in this series, it is amazing. The details and game play are amazing.

I'm only about 1 1/2 hours in so far, but this is a good one. It's the same developer as Demon's Rise 1 & 2, and so far this game is basically those, but just better in every way. Also, if DR 1&2 are any indication, the dev will provide a bunch of support to this, both with new context and polishing until it's as bug free as possibe. Plus no ads, no IAP.
